item.title: Hyperobjekt: Year in Review
item.description: As we gear up for a promising 2020, we look back on this past year with feelings of gratitude and accomplishment. It was an intensely-eventful time for our team, full of opportunities to perform challenging, creative work aligned with our values. I. The Educational Opportunity Project at Stanford University At the start of the year, we were hired by Stanfordâ€™s Center for Education Policy Analysis to map and visualize test scores from their preeminent database of national education statistics (known as the Stanford Education Data Archive, or SEDA).
